name: TM Network: Live in Power Bowl
overview: TM Network: Live in Power Bowl (TMネットワーク ライブ イン パワーボウル?)[2] is a Japanese-only Nintendo Family Computer game featuring the J-Pop group TM Network. The song used as the background music is "Come On Everybody" from their album Carol -A Day In a Girl's Life 1991- (using the 8-bit sound chip of the Family Computer). Interestingly, the game uses Atlus NES sound engine by Tsukasa Masuko.
